name: Icarus (itch) (PTLux1517)
description:
BSU Game Dev project 3.

Project requirements video:

(Sorry for the length, I didn't realize how long I was talking. It's probably okay to watch it on 2x speed)

Description:

Play as Icarus, the legendary winged man, in a labyrinth designed by your father Daedalus to test the newly invented wings. Fires within the maze threaten to melt the wax holding them together,  so you must put them out or you won't make it.

Controls:

Movement: ASDW / left gamepad joystick

Camera: mouse movement / right gamepad joystick

Jump: spacebar / left gamepad trigger or bottom gamepad button

Attack: left click / right gamepad trigger

Interact: right click / left gamepad button or x

Reset (to start screen): esc / gamepad select button

Credits:

The floors, walls, and ceiling meshes were done by me, as well as Icarus' sword, the copper fire bowls, and the jars of sleeping incense. All other meshes were obtained on Sketchfab.com and were created by the following artists.

Door - "Wooden door." (https://skfb.ly/6zqN8) by Sam is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Wall Torch - "Torch" (https://skfb.ly/6WTCI) by Daan van Leeuwen is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/).
